item.title: Home 2 Small
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="1"][vc_column][rev_slider_vc alias="creative-freedom"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_bgcolor="#f6f6f5"][vc_column][distance type="5"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

How to Get your Business Online

[/vc_column_text][distance][vc_column_text]

You can create your company’s online presence in several ways. Explore all your options for getting your business online and see what works best for you.

[/vc_column_text][distance type="2"][distance type="5"][vc_tta_tabs style="modern" shape="round" color="white" spacing="35" gap="35" alignment="center" active_section="1" no_fill_content_area="true"][vc_tta_section i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-dot-circle-o" tab_id="1453793687346-39827114-1e6a" add_icon="true"][vc_column_text]

CHOOSE YOUR DOMAIN

[/vc_column_text][distance type="3"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="9809" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="left-to-right"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]If you’re thinking of starting up online, or creating a new blog, finding a memorable name can be a great way of boosting your chances of success. But, choosing one can be really tricky. It’s one of the most difficult steps in getting started. There are a lot of things to consider and it can feel overwhelming, so here are some tips to make it easier. After all, your website is the face of your business online. We’ll cover the following topics:[/vc_column_text][distance][vc_column_text][one_half][list-ul type="check"][li-row]Make it memorable[/li-row][li-row]Make it short[/li-row][li-row]Make it easy to spell[/li-row][/list-ul][/one_half][one_half][list-ul type="check"][li-row]Avoid hyphens [/li-row][li-row]Avoid trademarked names[/li-row][li-row]Include relevant keywords[/li-row][/list-ul] [/one_half][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]All of the factors we’ve discussed should be considered when choosing your domain name.  Based on your situation you may disregard some to focus on others, and that’s fine.  These factors will help you make the best choice for your business from the available options.[/vc_column_text][distance type="3"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="linecons" i_icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-data" tab_id="1454228797284-23ab691b-78a1" add_icon="true"][vc_column_text]

CHOOSE YOUR HOST

[/vc_column_text][distance type="3"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="9810" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="left-to-right"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][distance type="2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]
[icon name="fa-check" size="16px" color="#00c2e5"] Determining Your Needs
Look at your current website. When choosing a web host, always try to keep the future in mind and plan accordingly.
[icon name="fa-check" size="16px" color="#00c2e5"] Choose hosting Type
There are three general types of servers offered by web hosting companies: Shared, virtual and dedicated servers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][distance type="2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]
[icon name="fa-check" size="16px" color="#00c2e5"] Comparing Features
Compare important feature such as storage, bandwidth, acceptable security tools and server operating system
[icon name="fa-check" size="16px" color="#00c2e5"] Order web Hosting
Select the web hosting package. After the order is processed, you receive an e-mail that contains further instructions about your account[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="linecons" i_icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-pen" tab_id="1454228839423-c53893db-b78e" add_icon="true"][vc_column_text]

WEBSITE DESIGN

[/vc_column_text][distance type="3"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="9811" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="left-to-right"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][distance type="2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]
[icon name="fa-check" size="16px" color="#00c2e5"] Planning
The planning stage is arguably the most important, because what’s decided and mapped here sets the stage for the entire project.
[icon name="fa-check" size="16px" color="#00c2e5"] Design
The design stage typically involves moving the information outlined in the planning stage further into reality. The main deliverable is a visual representation.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][distance type="2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]
[icon name="fa-check" size="16px" color="#00c2e5"] Development
Development involves the bulk of the programming work, as well as loading content (whether by your team or the client’s).
[icon name="fa-check" size="16px" color="#00c2e5"] Launch
The purpose of the launch phase is to prepare the website for public viewing. This requires final polishing of design elements and most of all, a consideration of the user experience.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="linecons" i_icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-search" tab_id="1454228834892-9f894ebc-dfde" add_icon="true"][vc_column_text]

SEARCH ENGINE OPTIMIZATION

[/vc_column_text][distance type="3"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="9812" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="left-to-right"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][distance type="2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]
[icon name="fa-check" size="16px" color="#00c2e5"] Keyword Analysis
We research your industry to determine which terms are most often used to find businesses like yours.
[icon name="fa-check" size="16px" color="#00c2e5"] On-Page SEO
Optimizing your content for search includes tasks like keyword usage, keyword placement, readability and more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][distance type="2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]
[icon name="fa-check" size="16px" color="#00c2e5"] Link Building
Our expert Link Builders are focused on building authoritative and relevant links to your site.
[icon name="fa-check" size="16px" color="#00c2e5"] Local SEO services
Our local SEO services provide everything you need to rank and drive traffic in your local market. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][distance type="4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row blox_class="border-btm"][vc_column][distance type="5"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Why Choose US

[/vc_column_text][distance type="3"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][iconbox type="8" icon_title="Integrated services" iconbox_content="As a leading digital agency we are able to offer a fully integrated service beyond the initial website design" icon_name="icon-recycle"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="8" icon_title="Creative Team" iconbox_content="We’ll give you creative ideas to bring your campaigns to life and as always will grow in an abundance of friendly" icon_name="icon-circle-compass"][distance type="2"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][iconbox type="8" icon_title="Affordable Prices" iconbox_content="We are always able offer our customers the widest range of services at the best prices" icon_name="icon-wallet"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="8" icon_title="25 Days Money Back" iconbox_content="To guarantee that we deliver on our promises, we provide a 25-days money back refund" icon_name="icon-strategy"][distance type="2"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][iconbox type="8" icon_title="Superior Support" iconbox_content="We employ a staff of fully trained, friendly and professional agents that are available 24/7" icon_name="icon-shield"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="8" icon_title="Responsive Design" iconbox_content="We build responsive websites that auto adapt to device screens, like smart phones, tablets and desktop" icon_name="icon-mobile"][distance type="2"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][distance type="4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_image="9806" blox_padding_top="100" blox_padding_bottom="100" blox_dark="true"][vc_column][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Some Facts

[/vc_column_text][distance type="4"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][maxcounter type="2" count="7" title="YEARS OF EXPERINCE" color="#4ff37c" icon="icon-hourglass"][distance type="2"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][maxcounter type="2" count="873" title="PROJECTS COMPLETED" color="#4ff37c" icon="icon-toolbox"][distance type="2"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][maxcounter type="2" count="99" suffix="%" title="CUSTOMERS SATICFICATION" color="#4ff37c" icon="icon-trophy"][distance type="2"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][maxcounter type="2" count="75" title="CLIENTS WORKED WITH" color="#4ff37c" icon="icon-hotairballoon"][distance type="2"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][distance type="4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance type="5"][distance type="3"][vc_column_text]

Clients Say

[/vc_column_text][distance type="3"][testimonial_slider type="tetra"][testimonial_item name="Lida Anderson" img="6255" subtitle="Manager" testimonial_content="Lida has assisted me with questions in regards to web hosting and has offered me more insight in half an hour than my current host did in all the years I have been with them."][testimonial_item name="Sarah Miller" img="6277" subtitle="Designer" testimonial_content="One of the best theme I have ever used. Every minor detail has been taken care of. Clean, Modern Design can be used for any type of website. Excellent template."][testimonial_item name="Jack Lampard" img="6276" subtitle="Developer" testimonial_content="Every minor detail has been taken care of. Clean, Modern Design can be used for any type of website. Excellent template. One of the best theme I have ever used."][/testimonial_slider][distance type="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column][distance type="5"][distance type="3"][vc_column_text]

Request a Service

[/vc_column_text][distance type="3"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][contact-form-7 id="31"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][distance][distance type="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Website Design
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="3" blox_image="9890" align_center="aligncenter" page_title="page-title-x" blox_dark="true" parallax_speed="7"][vc_column][distance type="5"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

WEBSITE DESIGN

[/vc_column_text][distance type="5"][distance type="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3" el_class="aligncenter"][distance type="5"][distance][icon size="64px" color="#d6d6d6" name="icon-desktop"][distance][vc_column_text]

Affordable Website Design & Development

Web designing is an art! Your website design shows your business insight. A well known saying is "First impression is the lasting one". In web technologies, your website is the first entity that interacts with the visitor, so your website should speak itself!

The websites we produce are clean and fresh, each uniquely designed. Furthermore, we endeavor to ensure all our sites meet the accessibility standards demanded by the World Wide Web Consortium. Our websites are tested in the most commonly used browsers at different screen resolutions.

[/vc_column_text][distance][distance][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Service Includes

Why WordPress?

A CMS, or content management system, is a tool that allows you manage the content of your website independently. WordPress is flexible, highly customizable, super user-friendly, and is a great content management system (CMS). You can use it for blogs, small business websites, and even e-commerce. We have highly skilled developers that can bring your site up to date and add that custom touch you always wanted. Wordpress Theme Customization

At Easyweb, everything 'Wordpress' is our strong suit, and we endeavor to offer you Wordpress theme customization services that lets you transform your themes to solutions that are all-inclusive, versatile, and riveting. While tailoring your themes to suit your business sensibilities, we take every measure to keep it responsive and compatible across different platforms. Without falling prey to the mainstream and hardly effective ways of theme customization, we deliver services that make this customization a pleasant romp. Then they show that show to the people
